EmailTemplate.subject: Net Cash Estimates & MBO Information (1328204955.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4
Hi Ivonne,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful as discussed:
We have created an index of past webinars on topics specifically catered for independent consultants. You can view our index by going here. In addition we have a 2012 Webinar track that will cover everything to do with working independently. We have three tracks, you can sign up to receive notifications when new webinars are scheduled by going here. Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here. If you have questions, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule and we will walk through the net cash estimates I created for you at that time (attached as PDF).
I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
